show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content: Listening to Penelope Young Andrade LCSW exchange with ideas me is like immersing yourself in an inspiring... <!--more--> psychotherapy session.   Learn more about your emotions and how they can promote your success and happiness!  For clients, therapists who want to be true to their work, and anybody with feelings.
